text:
Arthur Docters van Leeuwen (8 May 1945 – 14 August 2020) was a Dutch politician, jurist and civil servant. He was member of the liberal political party VVD. Between 1999 and 2007 he was chairman of the Netherlands Authority for the Financial Markets. He was born in The Hague.
Docters van Leeuwen died from a heart attack on 14 August 2020 from a heart attack, aged 75.

annotations.surface_form: Netherlands Authority for the Financial Markets
